ISSUE.TITLE: Null reference exception in the Admin theme
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: While upgrading our website from 1.6 to 1.82, we ran into an issue with the Admin theme. Line 12 in NavigationItemLink-admin.cshtml is not checking for null, which prevents the theme from rendering. Original: if (Model.Href.ToString() == "#") Changed to: if ( ( Model.Href?.ToString() ?? "#" ) == "#") Thanks

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Use static typing in ContentFieldsProvider instead of dynamic. (#15763)
